artifact.art_title: The system shall allow authorized personnel to access records via secure connectivity from anywhere, at any time.
The system provides patients with a unique login and password.
The system shall provide patients the ability to securely view physician approved medical data and lab results.
The system shall have a secure message capability whereby patients can send messages to the practice and vice versa.
The system shall allow patients to view their demographic data and insurance information, and make changes to demographic information.
The system shall allow patients to schedule their own appointments.
The system shall comply with HL7 to interface and import/export data from other HL7 compliant systems.
The system shall allow providers to create pre-defined templates.
The system shall support prescription printing and faxing.
The system shall route reports with attached notes for others to review.
The system shall allow physicians to review diagnosis from previous encounters.
The system shall allow data to be displayed as flow sheets and growth charts for analysis.
The system shall allow select outside providers to be copied on results.
The system shall set no limit to the number of order forms that can be created.
The system shall allow order forms to be created universally or specifc to individual providers.
The system shall allow progress note templates to be customized by the practice.
The system shall provide the physician with a snapshot view of daily schedules.
The system shall provide the physician with health maintenance items requiring immediate attention.
The system shall provide the physician with items requiring signature approvals.
The system shall generate alerts for appointment recall.
The system shall generate alerts for prescription refills.
The system shall generate alerts for laboratory orders.
The system will alert the provider as to any due or over due tasks as well as any suggested protocols for the patient when a patient's record is accessed.
The system shall prevent the creating of duplicate patient records.
The system audit trail shall automatically capture system data changes, edits, charged, credits by all users.
The system shall allow the administrator to establish user-defined security levels per user login.
The system shall track no-shows and cancellations.
The system shall allow the user to define color coding for appointment types and reasons.
The system shall support voice recognition so a provider can dictate notes to the patient's electronic record.
The system shall support hand recognition so a provider can notate directly to a patient's electronic record.
The system shall allow specified users to create prescriptions for physicians to approve.
The system shall transmit prescriptions to the patient's pharmacy.
The system shall allow physicians to generate prescriptions via their favorites list.
The system shall allow the patient to fill out questionnaires/paperwork in advance through the portal.
